fields.hint: Should be unique, short and descriptive.
fields.label: Title

fields.hint: Date when the page was originally created.
fields.label: Date

fields.hint: Description for SEO purposes. Should be less than 160 characters.

fields.hint: Categories for SEO purposes that are sorted by language. 5 to 10 categories are usually recommended.
fields.label: Categories
fields.name: categories

fields.hint: Tags for SEO purposes that are sorted by language. 3 to 10 tags are usually recommended.
fields.label: Tags
fields.name: tags

fields.hint: If true, saves this as a draft and doesn't publish the page.
fields.label: Draft
fields.name: draft

fields.hint: Transforms page into external link. Format: https://example.com.
fields.label: External link
fields.name: externalUrl

fields.hint: Can include formatted text, headings, lists, images, ...
